messages.content: You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a TEDTalk video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0,minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60'" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -af "highpass=f=200,lowpass=f=3000,acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a Vox video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset medium -crf 22 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -ar 44100 -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a TaiChi video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance an MGIF video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance an Interview video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "eq=contrast=1.0:brightness=0.05:saturation=1.2,minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -af "highpass=f=200,lowpass=f=3000,acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a Documentary video.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "deshake,minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -af "highpass=f=200,lowpass=f=3000,acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a SportsVideo.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=120',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a MusicVideo.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "eq=saturation=1.5,minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 320k -ar 48000 -af "highpass=f=200,lowpass=f=10000,acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance an AnimatedMovie.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -af "acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
You are a video enhancement expert.
Generate an FFmpeg script to enhance a NatureDocumentary.

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf "eq=contrast=1.1:saturation=1.2,minterpolate='mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:vsbmc=1:fps=60',unsharp=5:5:0.5:5:5:0.0" -c:v libx264 -preset slow -crf 18 -c:a aac -b:a 192k -ar 44100 -af "highpass=f=100,lowpass=f=12000,acompressor=threshold=0.5:ratio=4:attack=20:release=100" -movflags +faststart output.mp4
